description:
The XenAPI compute driver options.  

These are properties specific to compute drivers.  For a list of all hypervisors, see here: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/HypervisorSupportMatrix.

auto_disk_config.title: Disk Adapter Type
auto_disk_config.description: If true, the root partition on the disk is automatically resized before the instance boots. This value is only taken into account by the Compute service when using a Xen-based hypervisor with the XenAPI driver. The Compute service will only attempt to resize if there is a single partition on the image, and only if the partition is in ext3 or ext4 format.
